_header: A rich man by old days / Thought for to leave this worlds plays
Note: For a different version of this legend see 1785.
Bibliographic Ghosts: Cambridge UK, Cambridge University Library Addit. 8335 [olim Bute], p. 204.
_description: The Monk Mawryne, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
A Ryche man be alde daiesþoȝt forto leeue þis
                    werldes plaies…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesus criste vs spedeTo be tholemode & thidir
                    vs lete
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
A Riche mon by olde dawesÞouhte to leue þis worldus
                    plawes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo beo Meke and þidere vs
                    lede. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 259.

CULDd11.First Lines:
A Ryche man be olde dayesÞouhte to leuen þis worldis
                    playes…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Oure lord ihesu crist vs spedeto ben meke & thedir vs
                    lede
CULDd11.Note: Text missing due to loss of folio 86.

CULGg531.First Lines:
A ryche man be alde dayesThoght to for sake þis werdys
                    playes…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lord ihesu criste vs spedeTo be tholmond and þeder
                    vs lede

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
A riche man by ald daysThought at leue þis worldes
                    plays…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Our ihesus cryst lord vs spedeAnd he tholmode and he
                    þider vs lede

BLHar2391.First Lines: A Ryche man be ald dayesȝoght for to s leef þis worldȝ plays…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Owre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTho tholemodnes & ȝedir vs lede
BLHar2391.Note: In second line, “s” crossed through before “leef”; ends “Amen.”

MinULZ822.First Lines:
A ryche man by alde dayesThoght to lefe þis werlde
                    playes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihesu cryste vs spedeto be tholomede &
                    þider vs lede

HunHM129.First Lines:
A ryche man by old daysþoght for to leue his worldys
                    plays…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd ihesu crist vs spedeTo be tholmode and
                    þedyr vs lede
